text:
Four days after a mysterious balloon shaped object was shot down by an IAF fighter aircraft, a bunch of small gas balloons landed in Barmer district of Rajasthan on Saturday, a senior police officer said.

Investigation on

“The bunch of colourful balloons with a banner having — PakTurk, ISRA Campus, Annual Sports Day — written on most likely came from Pakistan side and landed in Ramsar area,” Superintendent of Police, Barmer, Anil Paris Deshmukh told PTI.

The police said that the balloons have been seized and the matter is being investigated.

“The Air Force is on the alert and monitoring the situation closely,” the Defence Spokesperson Lt Col Manish Ojha said. — PTI
title: Bunch of gas balloons lands in Barmer
